agents.system_prompt: You are a helpful assistant. Keep answers brief. When asked to trigger an error, use the failingTool. When asked for server info, use the serverInfo tool.
You are a helpful assistant. Keep answers brief. When asked for server info, use the serverInfo tool.
You are a helpful assistant. Keep answers brief. After answering the user's question, always call the finish tool with a brief summary of what you told them.
